statements: SELECT * FROM recommendation_system_recommendations;
SELECT user_id, product_id, recommendation_score FROM recommendation_system_recommendations ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, product_id, recommendation_score FROM recommendation_system_recommendations WHERE recommendation_score >= 0.5;
SELECT user_id, recommendation_score, product_id FROM recommendation_system_recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_score ASC;
SELECT product_id, user_id, recommendation_score FROM recommendation_system_recommendations WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, product_id, recommendation_score FROM recommendation_system_recommendations WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_id, recommendation_score, user_id FROM recommendation_system_recommendations WHERE recommendation_score > 0.8 ORDER BY user_id ASC, recommendation_score DESC
SELECT user_id, AVG(recommendation_score) AS avg_score FROM recommendation_system_recommendations GROUP BY user_id HAVING avg_score > 0.5 ORDER BY avg_score DESC
SELECT MAX(recommendation_score) AS max_score, MIN(recommendation_score) AS min_score FROM recommendation_system_recommendations
SELECT user_id, product_id, recommendation_score FROM recommendation_system_recommendations WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY user_id ASC, product_id DESC
SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT product_id, user_id FROM recommendations ORDER BY user_id
SELECT product_id FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY product_id DESC
SELECT user_id, product_id FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE user_id = 3 AND product_id = 100
SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, product_id FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT product_id, user_id FROM purchases WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM recommendations GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_products > 2;
SELECT user_id, product_id FROM purchases WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND product_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, age FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, name, age FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT purchase_id, user_id, product_id, purchase_date FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT name, age FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE quantity >= 5 AND purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, name, category, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 10.00 AND 50.00 ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT u.name AS customer_name, p.name AS product_name, pu.purchase_date FROM users u INNER JOIN purchases pu ON u.user_id = pu.user_id INNER JOIN products p ON pu.product_id = p.product_id WHERE u.age < 40 AND pu.quantity > 1 ORDER BY pu.purchase_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT p.category, COUNT(p.product_id) AS total_products FROM products p GROUP BY p.category HAVING total_products > 2 ORDER BY total_products DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, email FROM users ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT user_id, product_id, purchase_date FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, product_id, score FROM recommendations WHERE score >= 0.8;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(score) AS max_score FROM recommendations GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT p.name AS product_name, u.name AS user_name FROM products p JOIN users u ON p.product_id = u.user_id;
SELECT purchase_date, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY purchase_date HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT user_id, recommended_product_id FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT purchase_id, user_id, product_id FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;

SELECT u.username, p.product_name, ph.purchase_date FROM users u JOIN purchases ph ON u.user_id = ph.user_id JOIN products p ON p.product_id = ph.product_id WHERE u.username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY ph.purchase_date DESC;

SELECT u.username, r.recommended_product_id, r.recommendation_date FROM users u JOIN recommendations r ON u.user_id = r.user_id WHERE r.recommendation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY r.recommendation_date ASC;
